Room.Name: Lyanden Road/Forest Road Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Lyanden Road and Forest Road. Lyanden Road runs east and west, while Forest Road continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: Lyanden Road is wide and well maintained, but it looks like Forest Road could use a little work. The trees seem to hang excessively low as you look to the north. You can't see very far to the west, but a road sign says that Oceancrest is in that direction. It also says Brownhaven is east.
